segments.text: I glance at the kitchen and spot the overflowing sink immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All that water gushing out, making everything soggy and ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting drenched, and the floor is a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying her plate, unaware of the disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating how she's ignoring the puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the kids are up to no good with that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is perched on a shaky stool, hand deep in the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing by, ready to grab one too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking treats like thatâ€”it's a bit naughty, but I get it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view from the window is lovely, with bushes and a path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes the inside chaos seem even more out of place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing water wasted like this; turn off the faucet!
segments.speaker: PAR
